item.title: Mike Flanagan Is Right About One Of The Most Underrated Stephen King Movies Of All Time
item.description: Of the many movie adaptations of Stephen King's works, Mike Flanagan correctly highlighted one as deserving of far more attention than it gets.

item.title: Could Gladiator 2's Caracalla Actually Have Had Syphilis? Historian Weighs In
item.description: A Roman historian discusses the historical accuracy behind the erratic behavior of the young emperor Caracalla in Ridley Scott's Gladiator 2.

item.title: Mistborn Era 3's Release Plan Benefits A Movie But It Won't Matter For At Least 10 Years
item.description: Mistborn Era 3â€™s release plan means the books will likely come out in quick succession of one another, benefiting any movie adaptations.
